title: The SUICIDE SQUAD: Every Easter Egg and Reference + Guardians of the Galaxy Connection | BREAKDOWN
author: ScreenCrush
comment: What villains do you want to see appear in the next Suicide Squad?

Did anyone else have that "Oh shit, Waller really is a monster" moment when they realized the reason she wanted to "Turn Bloodsport into a leader" was connected to the plan of team 1 being cannon fodder? Not just that she needed a leader plausible leader for each team but that she specifically decided that Flag was expendable and Bloodsport would be her preferred field leader going forward (similar skill set and experience, but that Flag's more developed moral compass made him harder to control).
One thing I learned from MARVEL and DC is never underestimate A RAT
Taika was offered the directors chair for GOTG 3, but turned it down out of professionalism towards Gunn. I’d like to believe his small role in the film was a thank you from Gunn.

"I enjoyed just floating in space & looking at the stars"

....was not expecting to feel so bad for Starro...another captive soul in the story
description:

The Suicide Squad is James Gunn's bloody romp through the DCEU. While it's clear that Gunn and his loaded cast are having a ball, the movie is also filled with Easter Eggs and subtext. We explain the Easter Eggs, themes, and explain that whole deal about the birds.
